import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { Form, Button } from 'semantic-ui-react'; import container from '../../ethereum/container'; import web3 from '../../ethereum/web3'; import style from '..' class Formcreate extends Component { state = { ContainerID:'', WarehouseID:'', ProductName:'', HalalSatus:'', Quantity:'' } onSubmit = async (event) => { event.preventDefault(); const accounts = await web3.eth.getAccounts(); await container.methods.SetUserInfo(this.state.ContainerID, this.state.WarehouseID, this.state.ProductName,this.state.HalalSatus, this.state.Quantity).send({from: accounts [0]}); }; render() { return (

Container Form

Not a member? Signup
); } } export default Formcreate;
